/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the street, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban scene below.
